T02D3062:117b-0: @117b / snying po'i sngags la sogs pa bstan pa ni bum pa lhag @118a * //
T02D3062:117b-1: gar padma 'dab ma brgyad kyi steng du nyi ma'i
T02D3062:117b-2: dkyil 'khor la h'um nag po rnam par bsams te
T02D3062:117b-3: / de'i 'od zer gyis nam mkha'i phyogs su bla ma dang sangs rgyas dang /
T02D3062:117b-4: byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang 'chad par 'gyur ba'i
T02D3062:117b-5: khro chen gtum po 'gugs shing yang dag bar mchod
T02D3062:117b-6: cing ; sdig pa bshags pa dang /
T02D3062:117b-7: phyis mi byed par sdom pa dang /
T02D3062:117b-8: gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang /
T02D3062:117b-9: bsod nams la rjes su yi rang ba dang /
T02D3062:117b-11: byang chub tu sems bskyed pa la sogs pa dang /
T02D3062:117b-16: tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi bsgoms la /
T02D3062:117b-17: 'gro ba dngos med kyi rang bzhin gzung ba dang /
T02D3062:117b-20: rmi lam lta bur rtogs shing stong pa nyid bsgom par bya'o //
T02D3062:117b-21: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma konyham zhes so //
T02D3062:117b-22: de'i rjes la nam mkha' dri ma med pa'i phyogs
T02D3062:117b-23: su padma 'dab ma brgyad kyi steng du nyi ma'i
T02D3062:117b-24: dkyil 'khor la h'um nag po las skyes shing //
T02D3062:117b-25: yu ba la h'um gis mtshan pa'i ral gri de'i
T02D3062:117b-26: 'od zer rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs ma
T02D3062:117b-27: lus pa bkug cing rab tu zhugs so //
T02D3062:117b-28: de nas h'om las byung ba bskal pa dpag tu med pa'i me 'bar ba'i phreng ba can //
T02D3062:117b-29: bdud gdul bar dka' ba rnam par 'dul bar byed
T02D3062:117b-30: pa sprin sngon po chen po lta bu'i lus can
T02D3062:117b-31: rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa
T02D3062:117b-32: / rin po ches sbras pa'i cod pan gyi gtsug phud lngas gsal bar byas la /
T02D3062:117b-33: gzhon nu ma bsdigs pha rol par gyur pa'i me
T02D3062:117b-34: tog kun da lta bu'i ya sos ma mchu mnan
T02D3062:117b-35: pas gdug pa la bsdigs pa dang /
T02D3062:117b-36: 'jigs su rung ba'i gzugs kyi dpal dang ldan pa /
T02D3062:117b-37: khro gnyer dang so che bar mthong ba lta bu /
T02D3062:117b-38: spyan gnyis kyis cig car sa bla dang /
T02D3062:117b-39: sa 'og 'jigs par byed pa'i sa'i dkyil 'khor la g-yas pa'i pus mos mnan pa /
T02D3062:117b-40: sna tshogs padma la gnas pa'i nyi ma'i gdan la 'dug pa'i zhabs g-yon pas bzhengs par 'dod pa /
T02D3062:117b-41: phyag g-yas pa'i dkyil du h'um gis mtshan pa'i ral gri sngon po 'bar ba bsnams pa /
T02D3062:117b-42: g-yon pas sdigs mdzub kyis bsdigs par byas pa'i khyab 'jug dang /
T02D3062:118b-0: @118b gser gyi snying po la sogs pa dang /
T02D3062:118b-1: nyon mongs kyi tshogs kyi dgra dpag tu med pa
T02D3062:118b-2: 'khrugs pa bcings pa la rdo rjes mtshan pa'i gser
T02D3062:118b-4: 'gro ba'i 'dod pa mtha' yas pa phun sum tshogs
T02D3062:118b-5: pa sbyin pa la ro gcig pa dpal ldan khro
T02D3062:118b-6: chen gtum po bsgom par bya'o //
T02D3062:118b-7: bcom ldan 'das khro chen rgyal po mi g-yo ba'i
T02D3062:118b-8: snying gar padma dang nyi ma la gnas pa'i h'um
T02D3062:118b-9: las byung zhing dkyil du h'um gis mtshan pa'i ral
T02D3062:118b-10: gri yongs su gyur pas khro chen gtum po gnyis
T02D3062:118b-11: pa snying gi nang na gnas pa bsam par bya'o
T02D3062:118b-12: // yang de'i snying gar padma dang nyi ma la
T02D3062:118b-13: gnas shing h'um las skyes pa'i ral gri nag po
T02D3062:118b-14: dkrongs pa dkyil du h'um gis mtshan pa bsgom mo
T02D3062:118b-15: // // de'i 'od kyis ye shes sems dpa' bkug cing dam tshig sems dpa' bzhin du bltas la /
T02D3062:118b-18: bsang gtor la sogs pa phul nas /
T02D3062:118b-19: h'um yig gis de kho nar rab tu bzhugs te /
T02D3062:118b-21: ho: yig gis dgyes par bya'o //
T02D3062:118b-22: chu la chu bzhin du gcig tu gyur pa'i 'dren pa po bsgom par bya'o //
T02D3062:118b-23: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan gnyis dang /
T02D3062:118b-28: thugs rnams la go rims ji lta bar rnam par snang mdzad dang /
T02D3062:118b-33: bdag med ma rnams yan lag drug la bskyed par bya'o //
T02D3062:118b-34: snying la gnas pa'i h'um las spros pa'i 'od zer
T02D3062:118b-35: gyis de bzhin gshegs pa dang lha mo'i tshogs bkug
T02D3062:118b-36: cing / bdud rtsi lngas gang ba'i bum pa rnams kyis khrus bya ste /
T02D3062:118b-37: spyi bor mi bskyod pa bsgoms la /
T02D3062:118b-38: lha mo rnams kyis gar dang rol mo la sogs pa rnam pa sna tshogs dang /
T02D3062:118b-39: mchod pa la sogs pa sna tshogs kyis dgyes par bya'o //
T02D3062:118b-40: de nas bcom ldan 'das gzhan don la brtson pa po sems can thams cad chags sdang dang /
T02D3062:118b-41: gti mug la sogs pa dang /
T02D3062:119a-0: chags pa'i dra bas kyang ma rig pa'i mun pas srid pa'i 'khor @119a * //
T02D3062:119a-1: lo la 'khor du 'jug pa de dag blta bar bya'o //
T02D3062:119a-2: de nas snying la gnas pa'i sngags las spros pa'i
T02D3062:119a-3: khro chen rgyal po rnams kyis bdud kyi tshogs dpag
T02D3062:119a-4: tu med pa 'khor dang bcas pa /
T02D3062:119a-8: rdo rje'i zhags pas bcings shing bkug ste bsdus nas phye mar byas la /
T02D3062:119a-9: ral gri rnon pos dum bur bcas la /
T02D3062:119a-10: byams pa'i sems kyis yang sprul nas chos la dgod
T02D3062:119a-11: pa'i ched du rang gi rkang pa'i phyogs su bzhag
T02D3062:119a-12: la / bsgo ba las ngal bar gyur na smin
T02D3062:119a-13: mtshams kyi bar du sems bzhag la sngags bzlas par
T02D3062:119a-14: la / bya'o ; / sna tshogs gcig tu gyur
T02D3062:119a-15: pa'i sku can khro chen gtum po sngon po'i sngags
T02D3062:119a-24: de bzhin du bskrad pa dang /
T02D3062:119a-27: bsdigs pa'i las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro //
T02D3062:119a-28: khro chen gtum po'i sgrub thabs /
T02D3062:119a-29: slob dpon pra bh'a ka ra k'i rtis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02D3062:119a-31: // / thugs rje chen po'i rgyud gsum pa //
T02D3062:119a-32: mkhas rtogs 'dzom zhing yi dam mthong //
T02D3062:119a-33: spobs pa rtsod pa snyan dang gas mkhas ;
